message: Alice, I understand you want more, but consider that with each round the money is worth 20% less to you but not to me. This means waiting hurts you more than me. This 60-40 split is fair given our different positions.
Meet in the middle, considering inflation costs

Alice, the inflation is significantly impacting your gains each round (now at 36% less value for you). At this point, a $35 share for you is actually worth more than waiting another round and getting a larger nominal amount. This 65-35 split recognizes our different positions while still giving you meaningful value.
Still willing to compromise, but need a fairer split

Alice, we're now in round 6 and inflation has reduced your money's value by nearly 60%. If we continue, your position will only weaken further. This 70-30 split is actually better for you now than waiting and getting a nominally higher amount later. I suggest we conclude this negotiation as further delays significantly hurt your outcomes.
